name: Mayakunjo Model Town
locationText: 220 feet western bypass road, Connecting 100 feet Gov road, Metro Rail, Proposed new bus terminal
description: Green Living with urban lifestyle is no more a myth for tranquility mongers. The urban dwellers of Dhaka city are always dreaming for living accommodations accompanied by garden with plants, open spaces for wander, trees for oxygen and lakes for boating & fishing. A place belonging magic touch of green-living in an environment friendly community with complementary fresh & clean breathing air accompanied by caring & sharing neighbors throughout the year, is a dream coming true by the grace of heavenly initiative called Unveiling the imaginations of urban dwellers and introducing the eco-friendly environment, Mayakunjo Model Town was developed with significant & dynamic aspects of green architecture which was meticulously planned and perfectly designed. The Best Brand of Living was flawlessly designed for the cream de la cream of societies finest. The architecture here is in creating spaces that interrelates, provokes and titillate the green senses. With the casual open layout, every composition of the architectural design exudes eminent and distinguished elegance.

keyFeatures.description: The land offers breathtaking views of rolling hills, lush meadows, and serene lakes, making it an ideal setting for nature enthusiasts and those looking for tranquility.
Each plot of land is generously sized and allows for customization to meet your unique lifestyle and architectural preferences.
The project includes plans for state-of-the-art amenities, including walking trails, a community clubhouse, and recreational areas for residents and guests.
is conveniently located near schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and major transportation routes, ensuring easy access to essential services.

name: Dream Square Model Town
locationText: 220 feet western bypass road, Connecting 120 feet Bosila-Kalatia road, Proposed new bus terminal , Shyamol bangla resort, Akiz foundation English medium school, Ibn sina hospital, university( proposed )
description: Near Mohammadpur-Dhanmondi, The proposed housing project 'Dream Square' adjacent to the proposed 170 ft Western Bypass should be your future address.Immediate registration. There is interest free easy installment facility.

name: Dream's Paradise
description: Mak Inno Group represents our most iconic project in Dhaka's most popular google_locations. With our bold and innovative designs, quality construction, and luxury finishing materials, we can guarantee that Dream's Paradise Project will completely transform your urban lifestyle.

name: Nishorgo Valley
description: Nishorgo Valley  is a prestigious real estate land project located in the Purbachal new town, offering a unique opportunity for investors and homeowners to experience country living at its finest. This expansive development spans 200 acres of pristine land, providing a wide range of options for those seeking to build their dream home or invest in the future.
